name: tails gets trolled v3
description:
the only song playable is die bastards 

all of the other songs do not work and have a error

if you want me to do taste for blood let me know

shadow: uselees as always, NOW IT'S MY TURN

notes don't line up with the music? well here are some steps to take.

.1 go to options

.2 choose the first one aka down scroll, now go back

.3 play on down scroll for a bit

.4 press enter and exit

.5 unable down scroll and your ready to play with up scroll
